string-array.name: libraryDescriptions
string-array.item: ActionBarSherlock is an extension of the support library designed to facilitate the use of the action bar design pattern across all versions of Android with a single API.
A library to simply implement card layouts.
Crouton is a class that can be used by Android developers that feel the need for an alternative to the Context insensitive Toast.
This library provides a simple to use refresh icon (which switches automatically between "refresh action" and "progress") for the action bar.
